raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  version: 3.11.0
  python_min: "3.9"

package:
  name: apscheduler
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/a/APScheduler/apscheduler-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4c622d250b0955a65d5d0eb91c33e6d43fd879834bf541e0a18661ae60460133

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: python -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python ${{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools >=64
    - setuptools_scm >=6.4
  run:
    - python >=${{ python_min }}
    - tzlocal >=3.0

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - apscheduler
        - apscheduler.executors
        - apscheduler.jobstores
        - apscheduler.schedulers
        - apscheduler.schedulers.blocking
        - apscheduler.triggers
        - apscheduler.triggers.cron
      pip_check: true
      python_version: ${{ python_min }}

about:
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: In-process task scheduler with Cron-like capabilities
  homepage: https://github.com/agronholm/apscheduler
  repository: https://github.com/agronholm/apscheduler
  documentation: https://apscheduler.readthedocs.io

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ddunwoody
    - synapticarbors
